workshoptitle: Fine-tune A Large Language Model For An Oracle APEX Application

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: An introduction to the objectives of this LiveLabs workshop.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare the Environment
tutorials.description: This lab helps the user prepare the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure tenancy for the workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Fine-tune the LLM
tutorials.description: In this lab, we configure the OCI Data Science environment, and perform the fine-tuning of the large language model.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Deploy the LLM
tutorials.description: This lab guides the user to deploy the fine-tuned LLM.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Use the LLM in an Oracle APEX Application
tutorials.description: Finally, in this lab, the user will create an Oracle APEX application that will use the LLM for inference.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
